DOC.brief_summary: To develop and implement quality improvement programs for the treatment of acute coronary syndrome (ACS) in China based on the successful experience of the AHA-Get with the Guidelines program. This two-year program will use data collection, analysis, feedback, and process improvement to extend the use of evidence-based guidelines throughout the healthcare system and improve patient care of acute coronary syndrome.
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with discharge diagnosis as acute coronary syndrome (including STEMI, NSTEMI and UAP) between November 2014 and June 2016
